title: Enna Marandhaen Lyrics Ivan Vera Madhiri Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Enna Marandhaen
Singer(s) : Madhushree
Lyricist : Na.MuthuKumar
Movie: Ivan Vera Mathiri (2013)
Music: Sathya.C

Yaar avano avano
Yaar avano avano
Yaar avano avano
avano ....

Enna marandhaen edharku marandhaen
ennai keteney
unnai ninaithu ennai marandhaen
yellaam marandheney

En perai marandhaen
en oorai marandhaen
en thozhigalai maradhaeney
en nadai marandhaen
en udai marandhaen
en ninaivinai marandhaeney

Andhi malai kovil marandhaen
adhigaalai kolam marandhaen
yen marandhaen ?

Kan thirandhum paarka marandhaen
kaal nadandhum padhai marandhaen
vaai thirandhum pesa marandhaen
naan pan... paadal marandhaen

Dhinam sandai podum thaayidam
kenja marandhaen
en kutti thangai avalidam
konja marandhaen

Padithadhellaam paadhi marandhaen
thervarayil meedhi marandhaen
naal kizhamai thaedhi marandhaen
naan min anjalin sedhi marandhaen

Naan ennai pattri avanidam
solla marandhaen
avan punnagayai moota katti
alla marandhaen

seo.description: Get the complete Enna Marandhaen Lyrics Ivan Vera Madhiri Song Lyrics from Ivan Vera Madhiri. Read the lyrics penned by Na Muthukumar and composed by Sathya C and sung by Madhusree. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Na Muthukumar, Ivan Vera Madhiri, Sathya C, Madhusree, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
